features: 【Ionizer Purification】This car air purifier built in negative ion purification and clean-light, effectively removes pollutants, like smoke, dust, odor and pollen, improve air quality release fresh air quickly make your breath more cleaner and healthier.

【One Button Operation & 3 Modes Optional】This small air purifier with one button operation and 3 modes, air cirulation, anion purification and 7 colors LED night light modes. Short press the button will change the different modes or turn on/off.

【Portable Size & USB Powered】This desktop air purifier with small size is 2.75*2.75*6.3 Inch, weight: 160g/0.35lb which is portable and charged by any USB port like power bank/laptop/any USB port ( wall charger/adapter not included). It can be conveniently placed everywhere. The small air purifier covers width coverage up to 107 sq.ft (10 sq.m). Suitable for any space like car, office, desk, small room and traveling.

【Low Noise with LED Night Light】With 7 colors LED night light and low noise operation below 20dB offer you a comfortable and quiet environment for sleeping. Perfect mini air purifier for kids, babies, family and personal.

【No need to replace the Filter】This usb air purifier adopts an air anion generator, when this it works, it will produce a large number of negative ions to effectively purify the air and improve the quality of the air. On this acount, we do not need to replace the filter, save your money for replacement filter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this in my car. It’s an excellent buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Made out of cheap materials and it doesn't work.
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get the air purifier to circulate and clean the air in a small office space. Once I opened the package, however, I knew it was a scam. The product is too light to be able to function in any way that is advertised. I thought however, that I would try plugging it into a USB power outlet to test it. It took tapping the power button several different ways before a light indicated that it was powered on, but nothing happened. I moved it to another outlet, and I couldn't get it to power on again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small but works!
reviews.reviewText: It’s small but it works for what I need which is my office space. Not bad for the price. Instructions in Chinese but I just I’ll figure it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It is a very quiet, and slim design. Different modes make the product flexible in use.Only knock on the product is attached cord, instead of a plug-in port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No English instructions. It is very noisy and not much air comes out of it. Don't think it worth the money even though it is not that expensive. I think I will return it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's a toy
reviews.reviewText: Cheap qualityPoor power. No air was coming putLight wasn't too bright, but I couldn't use it at all. It also had to be always plugged in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its a $20 generator
reviews.reviewText: Ion generators generally run $40-$200. This is a $20 ion generator and I want you to keep this in mind as you purchase this. Its light and made of very basic plastic. Its the sort of thing that you can find in any five or ten dollar store, so don't expect iPhone quality. That being said, It looks nice, it seems to work ok. The fan moves air, but isn't noisy. The night light feature isn't too bright, which is nice.Two things that surprised me was; 1. The buttons are marked in Chinese with the english translation being in fine print beneath the Chinese. (not a big deal.) 2. The USB cable is part of the machine. Meaning that you cant replace the cable.All in all, does it do what it says? YesDo I think this will last a long time? Probably not, but for $20 I'm not too disappointed.EDIT:Ok, I actually decided to test this. I Vape, and anyone who knows about vaping knows that we can produce huge clouds of smoke, so I took a clear 2 gallon plastic jar that I have, filled it with smoke to the point you could not see the unit inside it, then timed it. This little unit actually impressed me. It removed the smoke in just under four minutes.To get an idea how long it would take the smoke to settle without the machine, I redid the experiment without the machine in the jar. I stopped timing it after twelve minutes. The smoke really didn't settle much by that point, so it proved to me that it was the machine that had cleaned the air the first time.Again, I'm rather impressed.
